attributes.action: To help listen to sexual abuse victims regardless of his and her age
attributes.background: To help sexual abused victims get help when the judge doesn't give them the justice that the abuser deverse

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government and Parliament can't intervene in decisions taken by the courts, which are independent.
